definitions.text: search or inquire in a meddlesome way
examples: This guy is always nosing around the office

definitions.text: advance the forward part of with caution
examples: She nosed the car into the left lane

definitions.text: catch the scent of; get wind of
examples: The dog nosed out the drugs

definitions.text: push or move with the nose
having a nose (either literal or metaphoric) especially of a specified kind
